prompt: Dusty lo-fi hip-hop beat at 80 BPM. Muted kick and snare with heavy low-pass filtering, soft hi-hats at quarter notes. Warm jazz chords using triangle wave, Dm7 to Gmaj7 progression. Vinyl warmth with room reverb, relaxed Sunday morning vibe.

Dark Berlin techno at 132 BPM. Punchy TR-909 kick on every beat, crisp claps on 2 and 4, sizzling open hi-hats on the offbeats. Acid bassline with filter sweep using resonant sawtooth. Industrial, hypnotic, warehouse energy.
code: stack(s("bd*4").bank("RolandTR909").gain(0.9), s("~ cp ~ cp").bank("RolandTR909").gain(0.7), s("[~ hh]*4").bank("RolandTR909").gain(0.5), n("0 0 3 5").s("sawtooth").octave(2).cutoff(sine.range(300, 2500).slow(4)).resonance(0.5).gain(0.8)).cpm(33)

prompt: Hard Atlanta trap beat at 140 BPM half-time feel. Booming 808 kicks with long sub tail, sharp snare on the 3. Rolling hi-hat triplets that accelerate into 32nd note rolls. Deep sub bass, aggressive but bouncy.
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ ~ bd ~ ~ bd").bank("RolandTR808").gain(0.95), s("~ ~ ~ ~ cp ~ ~ ~").bank("RolandTR808").gain(0.85).delay(0.2), s("hh*3 hh*3 hh*6 hh*8").bank("RolandTR808").gain(0.55), n("0 ~ ~ 3 ~ ~ 0 ~").s("sawtooth").octave(1).cutoff(200).gain(0.9)).cpm(17.5)

prompt: Warm deep house groove at 122 BPM. Four-on-floor kick, offbeat hi-hats, claps on 2 and 4 with reverb tail. Smooth chord stabs alternating Cm7 and Am7, filtered sine bass. Spacious, late-night club warmth.
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.85), s("~ cp ~ cp").gain(0.6).room(0.5), s("[~ hh]*4").gain(0.4), note("<[c3,eb3,g3,bb3] [a2,c3,e3,g3]>").s("sine").gain(0.5).cutoff(800).room(0.5).slow(2), n("0 ~ 3 ~").s("sine").octave(2).cutoff(400).gain(0.7)).cpm(30.5)

prompt: Floating ambient soundscape at 60 BPM. Evolving pad drone on C with slow filter modulation, sparse arpeggiated notes through heavy delay and reverb. Occasional soft kick for pulse. Ethereal, meditative, vast space.
code: stack(n("c2").s("sawtooth").cutoff(sine.range(100, 600).slow(16)).gain(0.4).room(0.9).size(0.9), n("c4 e4 g4 ~ b4 ~ g4 e4").s("sine").gain(0.35).slow(4).delay(0.5).delaytime(0.375).delayfeedback(0.6).room(0.8), s("~ ~ ~ bd").gain(0.25).room(0.7)).cpm(15)

prompt: Liquid drum and bass at 174 BPM. Rolling breakbeat with syncopated kick and snare, fast shimmering hi-hats. Warm reese bass with subtle movement, uplifting pad chords. Smooth, flowing, euphoric energy.
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ bd sd ~ bd ~").fast(2).gain(0.9), s("hh*8").gain(0.5), n("0 ~ ~ 0").s("sawtooth").octave(1).cutoff(sine.range(150, 500).slow(2)).gain(0.85), note("<[c4,e4,g4] [a3,c4,e4]>").s("sine").gain(0.4).room(0.6).slow(4)).cpm(43.5)

prompt: Retro synthwave at 110 BPM. Punchy gated drums with snare on 2 and 4, bright arpeggiated sawtooth lead climbing C E G B C. Lush pad chords with chorus, neon 80s nostalgia, driving and cinematic.
code: stack(s("bd ~ sd ~").gain(0.85), s("hh*4").gain(0.4), n("<c4 e4 g4 b4 c5 b4 g4 e4>").s("sawtooth").fast(2).gain(0.55).cutoff(2000).room(0.4), note("<[c3,e3,g3] [a2,c3,e3] [f3,a3,c4] [g3,b3,d4]>").s("triangle").gain(0.4).room(0.5).slow(2)).cpm(27.5)

prompt: Hypnotic minimal techno at 128 BPM. Sparse four-on-floor kick, ghost snares that appear randomly, hi-hats with subtle swing. Single note bassline, lots of space between elements. Stripped back, meditative groove.
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.85), s("~ [~ cp] ~ ~").gain(0.5).degradeBy(0.3), s("hh*8").gain(0.35).degradeBy(0.15), n("0 ~ ~ 0").s("sine").octave(2).cutoff(300).gain(0.7)).cpm(32)

prompt: Create a simple drum beat with kick and snare
code: s("bd sd").gain(0.9)

prompt: Make a fast techno beat with hi-hats
code: stack(s("bd ~ bd ~"), s("hh*8").gain(0.6)).cpm(32)

prompt: Play a slow ambient melody
code: n("c4 e4 g4 ~").s("sine").gain(0.7).slow(2).room(0.5).cpm(15)

prompt: Jazzy chords with brushed hi-hats and walking bass at 95 BPM. Cmaj7 to Dm7 to G7 progression, soft and intimate late-night jazz club feel with room reverb.
code: stack(note("<[c3,e3,g3,b3] [d3,f3,a3,c4] [g2,b2,d3,f3] [c3,e3,g3,b3]>").s("gm_acoustic_grand_piano").gain(0.6).room(0.4).slow(2), n("0 2 3 5 7 5 3 2").s("gm_acoustic_bass").gain(0.7).slow(2), s("hh*4").gain(0.3).lpf(3000)).cpm(24)

prompt: Aggressive industrial EBM at 125 BPM. Distorted four-on-floor kick, metallic claps, gritty sawtooth bassline with movement. Dark and mechanical.
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.95).distort(0.2), s("~ cp ~ cp").gain(0.8).distort(0.3), n("0 0 3 0").s("sawtooth").octave(2).cutoff(sine.range(200, 1500).fast(2)).distort(0.35).gain(0.85)).cpm(31)

prompt: Funky electro groove at 108 BPM. Syncopated kick pattern, offbeat claps, slap-style bassline with wah filter sweep. Groovy and danceable.
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ bd ~ bd ~ ~").gain(0.85), s("~ cp ~ ~ ~ cp ~ cp").gain(0.75), n("0 ~ 3 5 ~ 7 3 ~").s("sawtooth").octave(2).cutoff(sine.range(400, 1800).fast(2)).gain(0.8), s("hh*8").gain(0.45)).cpm(27)

prompt: Dubstep wobble at 140 BPM half-time. Sparse kick and snare, aggressive wobble bass with fast LFO modulation on filter. Heavy and dark.
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ sd ~").bank("RolandTR808").gain(0.95), n("0 0 0 0").s("sawtooth").octave(1).cutoff(sine.range(150, 2500).fast(8)).resonance(0.5).gain(0.9), s("hh*4").gain(0.4)).cpm(17.5)

prompt: UK garage 2-step at 132 BPM. Shuffled skippy drums with syncopated kick, pitched vocal-like stabs, warm bass. Bouncy and energetic.
code: stack(s("bd ~ [~ bd] ~").gain(0.85), s("~ cp ~ ~").gain(0.7), s("hh*4").gain(0.5).pan(rand), n("<c5 ~ e5 ~>").s("sine").gain(0.5).cutoff(1500).room(0.4), n("0 ~ 3 ~").s("sine").octave(2).gain(0.8)).cpm(33)

prompt: Chiptune 8-bit adventure music at 140 BPM. Crushed square wave melody, punchy bit-crushed drums, simple bassline. Retro game energy.
code: stack(s("bd ~ sd ~").gain(0.8).crush(8), n("<c5 e5 g5 c6 b5 g5 e5 c5>").s("square").gain(0.6).crush(10).fast(2), n("c3 c3 g3 g3").s("square").gain(0.55).crush(10)).cpm(35)

prompt: Classic boom bap hip-hop at 92 BPM. Hard-hitting kick and snare, dusty hi-hats, sample-based aesthetic. Golden era feel.
Dreamy vaporwave at 75 BPM. Slowed-down aesthetic, heavy reverb, detuned chords, nostalgic and surreal. Mall muzak vibes.
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ ~").gain(0.5).room(0.7), note("<[c4,e4,g4] [a3,c4,e4] [f4,a4,c5]>").s("triangle").gain(0.4).cutoff(800).room(0.8).delay(0.4).slow(2)).slow(2).cpm(19)

prompt: Trance anthem at 138 BPM. Euphoric building energy, sweeping filter on arpeggiated supersaw, four-on-floor with rolling bassline. Festival-ready uplift.
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.9), s("~ ~ cp ~").gain(0.7), s("hh*8").gain(0.5), n("<c4 d4 e4 g4 a4 g4 e4 d4>").s("sawtooth").fast(2).cutoff(sine.range(800, 4000).slow(8)).room(0.6).gain(0.65), n("0 0 3 5").s("sawtooth").octave(2).cutoff(600).gain(0.8)).cpm(34.5)

prompt: Downtempo trip-hop at 85 BPM. Sparse and moody drums, dark pad textures, atmospheric and cinematic. Bristol sound.
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ bd ~ ~ bd ~").gain(0.75), s("~ ~ sd ~ ~ ~ ~ ~").gain(0.6).room(0.6), note("<[d3,f3,a3] [c3,eb3,g3]>").s("triangle").gain(0.4).cutoff(600).room(0.7).slow(4)).slow(2).cpm(21)

prompt: Acid techno at 135 BPM. Classic 303-style bassline with squelchy filter resonance, driving four-on-floor, hypnotic and relentless.
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.9), s("~ ~ cp ~").gain(0.7), s("hh*8").gain(0.45), n("0 0 3 0 5 0 7 5").s("sawtooth").octave(2).cutoff(sine.range(200, 3000).fast(2)).resonance(0.6).gain(0.8)).cpm(34)

prompt: Electronic dub with heavy delay at 130 BPM. Spacious kick, snare with long delay tail, offbeat hi-hats, deep sub bass. Echoing and hypnotic.
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ ~").gain(0.85), s("~ ~ sd ~").gain(0.7).delay(0.6).delaytime(0.375).delayfeedback(0.65), s("~ hh ~ hh").gain(0.4).delay(0.4), n("0 ~ ~ 0").s("sine").octave(2).gain(0.75)).cpm(32.5)

prompt: Phonk beat at 130 BPM half-time. Dark Memphis-inspired, distorted kick, cowbells, aggressive but groovy. Drifting car vibes.
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ bd ~ ~ bd ~").gain(0.9).distort(0.15), s("~ ~ cp ~ ~ ~ cp ~").gain(0.8), s("~ cb ~ cb").gain(0.6), n("0 ~ 0 ~").s("sawtooth").octave(1).cutoff(300).gain(0.85)).slow(2).cpm(16)

prompt: Progressive house that builds and evolves at 126 BPM. Gradual filter opening, layered elements with periodic drops, tension and release.
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.85).every(16, degradeBy(0.7)), s("~ cp ~ cp").gain(0.6).every(8, room(0.6)), s("hh*8").gain(0.4).every(4, fast(1.5)), note("<[c3,e3,g3] [a2,c3,e3] [f3,a3,c4] [g3,b3,d4]>").s("sine").gain(0.5).cutoff(sine.range(400, 2000).slow(16)).room(0.5)).cpm(31.5)

prompt: Glitchy IDM pattern at 95 BPM. Randomly dropping elements, evolving filter chaos, experimental and unpredictable. Autechre-inspired.
code: stack(s("bd? ~ sd? ~").sometimes(rev).gain(0.8), n("0 3 5 7").s("triangle").fast(2).gain(0.6).cutoff(rand.range(400, 3000)), s("hh*8").degradeBy(0.3).gain(0.5)).cpm(24)

prompt: Epic boss battle music at 160 BPM. Intense driving drums, aggressive bass, dramatic brass stabs. High energy and urgent.
code: stack(s("bd*4").gain(0.95), s("hh*8").gain(0.5), n("0 0 5 3").s("sawtooth").octave(1).cutoff(500).gain(0.9), note("<[c4,e4,g4,c5]>").s("gm_brass_section").gain(0.6)).cpm(40)

prompt: Peaceful exploration music at 100 BPM. Gentle acoustic guitar arpeggios, soft strings, light percussion. Adventurous and open.
code: stack(n("<c4 e4 g4 c5 g4 e4>").s("gm_acoustic_guitar_steel").fast(2).gain(0.6), note("<[c3,e3,g3] [f3,a3,c4] [g3,b3,d4]>").s("gm_string_ensemble_1").gain(0.4).slow(2), s("bd ~ ~ ~ sd ~ ~ ~").gain(0.5)).cpm(25)

prompt: Reggae rhythm at 70 BPM. One-drop kick pattern, offbeat chord stabs, relaxed hi-hats. Island vibes, laid back.
code: stack(s("bd ~ ~ ~").gain(0.9), s("~ sd ~ ~").gain(0.8), note("<[c3,e3,g3] [f3,a3,c4] [g3,b3,d4]>").s("gm_acoustic_guitar_nylon").gain("~ 0.7 ~ 0.7"), s("~ ~ hh hh").gain(0.5)).cpm(17.5)

prompt: Dark dungeon ambient at 65 BPM. Ominous drone, sparse timpani hits, eerie vibraphone notes. Mysterious and tense.
code: stack(n("c2").s("sawtooth").cutoff(150).gain(0.5).room(0.9), s("~ ~ ~ bd").gain(0.3).delay(0.6).slow(2), n("<c4 eb4 ~ g4>").s("gm_vibraphone").gain(0.3).room(0.7).slow(2)).cpm(16)

prompt: Cinematic string tension at 80 BPM. Tremolo strings building intensity, dramatic timpani accents. Film score suspense.
code: stack(note("<[c3,eb3,g3] [c3,eb3,ab3] [c3,e3,g3]>").s("gm_string_ensemble_1").gain(sine.range(0.4, 0.7).fast(8)).slow(4), s("~ ~ ~ bd").s("gm_timpani").gain(0.6).slow(2)).cpm(20)
